thread.title: BRIEF-China Technology Solar Power Holdings Ltd Announces Strategic Cooperation Agreement Regarding A New Energy Power Station Project

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China Technology Solar Power Holdings Ltd Announces Strategic Cooperation Agreement Regarding A New Energy Power Station Project

organizations.name: brief-china technology solar power holdings ltd
new energy power station project china technology solar power holdings ltd

text:
China Technology Solar Power Holdings Ltd:
* CHINA TECHNOLOGY SOLAR POWER HOLDINGS LTD ANNOUNCES STRATEGIC COOPERATION AGREEMENT REGARDING A NEW ENERGY POWER STATION PROJECT
* CHINA TECHNOLOGY SOLAR POWER-SHAANXI BAIKE ENTERS SUBCONTRACTOR DEAL WITH CHINA CONSTRUCTION FOR ZHONG HE XIN CHENG PROJECT AT PRICE OF RMB74.62 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
